The data is retrieved from an external API and returned as a UmsatzFahrzeugMonteurProjectResultDto object. If no date range is specified, the method retrieves data for all available dates. Exceptions InvalidOperationException Thrown if the response content from the API is null. GetUmsatzByFahrzeugMonteurAsync(DateTime?, DateTime?, int, string) Retrieves revenue data for a vehicle mechanic based on the specified date range, category, and project database. public Task<UmsatzFahrzeugMonteurResultDto> GetUmsatzByFahrzeugMonteurAsync(DateTime? SaniertAmVon = null, DateTime? SaniertAmBis = null, int ComboBoxValue = 1, string projectDb = "defaultDb") Parameters SaniertAmVon DateTime? The start date of the date range filter. If null, no start date filter is applied. SaniertAmBis DateTime? The end date of the date range filter. If null, no end date filter is applied. ComboBoxValue int The category selector. Use 1 for "kanal" and any other value for "schacht". Defaults to 1. projectDb string The name of the project database to query. Defaults to "defaultDb". Returns Task<UmsatzFahrzeugMonteurResultDto> An UmsatzFahrzeugMonteurResultDto containing the revenue data for the specified filters. If an error occurs or the response content is null, an empty result is returned. Remarks This method sends an HTTP request to fetch revenue data for a vehicle mechanic. The data can be filtered by a date range and category, and the target database can be specified. If no date range is provided, the method retrieves all available data. The category is determined by the ComboBoxValue parameter, which selects between "kanal" (value 1) and "schacht" (other values). Exceptions InvalidOperationException Thrown if the response content is null after a successful HTTP request.

api/index.html.title: API Reference | IBE Application Documentation
api/index.html.summary: API Reference Welcome to the IBE Application API Reference. This documentation provides comprehensive information about all the services, DTOs (Data Transfer Objects), and other types in the IBE Blazor WebAssembly application. Services The application includes several service classes that handle communication with backend APIs: Core Services MonteurService - Complete CRUD operations for technician (Monteur) management Retrieve, create, update, and delete Monteure Assign Monteure to Anlagen (facilities) Track Monteur history and project assignments AnlagenService - Management of Anlage (facility) entities Full CRUD operations for facilities Retrieve facilities with associated Monteure Project-specific facility management Soft delete and restoration capabilities BauleiterService - Site manager (Bauleiter) operations Manage site managers and their project assignments Retrieve Bauleiter with associated projects ProjectService - Project management functionality Handle project lifecycle operations Customer and invoice associations Active project filtering ArbeitsscheinService - Work report management Generate detailed work reports Filter by facility, technician, and date ranges Export capabilities for reports Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) Core Entity DTOs Project - Main project entity with customer and Bauleiter associations BauleiterDto - Site manager information AnlageDto - Facility entity details XCustomer - Customer entity with contact and address information Address - Physical address representation Monteur DTOs MonteurResponse - Technician entity with full details MonteurWithAnlageDto - Technician with assigned facility ProjectMonteurDto - Project-technician relationship data Composite DTOs BauleiterWithProjectsDto - Site manager with associated projects ProjectCustomerInvoiceDto - Project with customer and invoice data AnlageWithMonteureDto - Facility with assigned technicians ProjectWithAnlagenDto - Project with associated facilities Work Report DTOs ArbeitsscheinDto - Individual work sheet details ArbeitsberichtDbSummeDto - Work report summary data UmsatzDto - Revenue calculation data Assignment DTOs AssignMonteurToAnlageDto - Technician-facility assignment AssignAnlageToProjectDto - Facility-project assignment UpdateProjectAnlageDto - Project facility update operations History and Tracking MonteurAnlageHistoryDto - Historical tracking of technician assignments XInvoice - Invoice tracking with project associations Validation ValidationErrorResponse - API validation error handling ValidationError - Individual validation error details Key Features HTTP Client Services All services use HttpClient for RESTful API communication with comprehensive error handling and response processing. Validation Support Services include built-in validation error handling with detailed field-level error reporting. Async/Await Pattern All service methods are asynchronous, following modern .NET patterns for non-blocking operations. Error Handling Comprehensive exception handling with logging and user-friendly error messages. JSON Serialization Full support for JSON serialization/deserialization with nullable reference types and proper attribute handling. Getting Started To use these services in your Blazor components: Inject the required service using @inject Call service methods from component lifecycle methods or event handlers Handle the returned data and any potential exceptions Update component state and UI accordingly Example:
